caption.title: Table S4 Primers for genotyping D. melanogasterresistance genes Ge-1, p62 (Ref(2)P) and CHKov-1.
caption.p: PCRs were carried out using a touchdown PCR cycle (95°C 30sec, 62°C (-1°C per cycle) 30sec, 72°C 1min; for 10x cycles followed by; 95°C 30sec, 52°C 30sec, 72°C 1min; for a further 25x cycles).
